title: Carol
author: Carol
desc: Carol once tried to become a professional napper but realized binge-watching shows was more her style. When not avoiding responsibilities, she’s busy making the world a funnier place.

title: Kara
author: Kara
desc: Kara’s superpower is turning coffee into code. Rumor has it she can debug bugs just by glaring at her screen. Still waiting for her cape to arrive.

title: Alex
author: Alex
desc: Alex once convinced everyone they were a ninja, but really just tripped over their own feet. Now mastering the art of walking without embarrassing themselves.
